We're happy to help.                   NYU Admissions staff welcome your questions. Before reaching out to us directly, we encourage you to do as much website research as possible.     For questions about the admissions process, please email admissions@nyu.edu .   Please include your full name, the school or institution you currently attend, and your city in e-mail correspondence.     During busy periods, it may take some time for us to respond to your inquiry. ResNet       NYU Blackboard       FAQs & Tutorials       NYUHome Help       ITS Training & Workshops       IT Service Status                     NYU Information Hotline: 1-212-998-1220   This hotline is used to provide recorded information on the University's current status, and will be used to transmit any important news or alerts. You can also check the NYU Information Alert web page: http://www.nyu.edu/info.alert .    NYU Public Safety: 1-212-998-2222   NYU's Office of Public Safety provides emergency help and information on a 24-hour basis. Use this number to request assistance or report an emergency.    Parent Helpline: 1-212-998-4219   A source of information and assistance for parents of NYU students regarding almost any University-related question or problem. The staff of the NYU Office of Student Life will answer your questions, refer you to appropriate resources, and, if necessary, act as a problem-solving liaison with other University units.    University Switchboard   The University switchboard (open from 8:00 a.m.-7:00 p.m., Monday-Friday during the regular semester)  provides directory listings for the following University centers: Washington Square; Kriser Dental Center;  Institute of Fine Arts (IFA); SCPS Midtown Center.     From on-campus: Dial 0   From outside of the NYU phone system: Dial 1-212-998-1212      To reach an NYU Medical Center operator to obtain directory listings   for the following locations: NYU Medical Center; Sterling Forest, Purchase, NY; Bellevue; Veterans Hospital     Dial 9 + 1 + 212 + 263-7300       Contact information for ITS resources not listed on this page:   Type a keyword into the search box on the upper right side of this page, search our knowledgebase , or search the NYU Directory .    Contact information for University-wide resources not listed on this page:   Search the NYU Directory .     Page last reviewed: July 29, 2013
